      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Die Ostsee. Küstenformen und Küstenschutz. Arbeitsblatt 1</string>
            <string language="en">The Baltic Sea. Coastal landforms and coast protection. Worksheet 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les formes de relief de mer baltique et la protection 
côtières de côte. Tableau 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os landforms do mar de Báltico e a proteção 
litorais da costa. Folha 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I landforms del Mar Baltico e la protezione 
litoranei del litorale. Foglio di lavoro 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η θάλασσα της Βαλτικής. Παράκτια landforms και
προστασία ακτών. Φύλλο εργασίας 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los landforms del mar báltico y la protección 
costeros de la costa. Hoja de trabajo 1</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">In eine schematische Zeichnung der Küste sind vorgegebene Begriffe einzutragen. Der Vorgang "Küstenabtragung" ist zu erklären.</string>
            <string language="en">Integrate the terms supplied into the schematic showing the coastline. Explain the process of "coastal erosion".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Küste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Küstenform</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Ostsee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Abtragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kliff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Brandung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coastal form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Baltic Sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Demolition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cliff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Surf</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intégrez les limites fournies dans le schéma 
montrant le littoral. Expliquez le processus "de l'érosion 
côtière".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Integre os termos fornecidos no diagrama 
esquemático que mostra o coastline. Explique o processo "da 
erosão litoral".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Integri i termini forniti nello schema che mostra 
la linea costiera. Spieghi il processo "di erosione litoranea".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενσωματώστε τους όρους που παρέχονται στη σχηματική 
αναπαράσταση που εμφανίζει την ακτή. Εξηγήστε τη διαδικασία
της "παράκτιας διάβρωσησ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Integre los términos provistos en el diagrama 
esquemático que muestra la línea de la costa. Explique el 
proceso de la "erosión costera".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Côte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forme côtière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mer Baltique</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
